visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart should have styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should represent monthly temperature data with a custom color scheme. Additionally, the chart should include a legend with a specific background and border color.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a spline chart titled 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The x-axis represents the months with styled labels and a title, while the y-axis represents the temperature in degrees Celsius, also with styled labels and a title. The data series includes monthly temperature data with a custom color scheme. The legend is styled with a specific background and border color to enhance the visual appeal of the chart. Additional colors are provided for potential future series, ensuring a consistent and visually appealing color scheme.
